author: eglynn
msg: test re-packaging - moved inappropriately packaged tests

author: eglynn
msg: code re-packaging - all implementation classes now under the appropriate sub-package of org.objectweb.celtix.bus

author: andreasmyth
msg: First cut of metadata for bus configuration - it is used to initialise transport and binding factories from configuration (default) values instead of hardcoded values.

The datatype in each case is a sequence of (classname, sequence of (namespaceURI)) - this has been added to the schema defining the standard types. No further convenience accessors have been added to the Configuration interface however.

author: andreasmyth
msg: Moved configuration default value validation into JAXB unmarshallers.
Implemented JAXB namespaceURI to package name mapping (in JAXBUtils) to not depend on schema annotations or system properties when unmarshalling configuration default values.

author: eglynn
msg: * amalgamated i18n for exceptions with logging, so localized exception
messages now live in the same resource bundles as log messages
